医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究分析了疗养院居民缺乏姑息治疗转诊的情况尽管疗养院有大量居民患有癌症、痴呆等严重疾病，但姑息治疗，即专注于缓解包括疼痛在内的症状和严重疾病压力的专门医疗护理，在疗养院中并未得到充分利用。 、帕金森病、心力衰竭或慢性阻塞性肺病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-analyzes-lack-of-palliative-care-referrals-for-nursing-home-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-analyzes-lack-of-palliative-care-referrals-for-nursing-home-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97b585d8-af23-4278-bd5f-f37cb979f462 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:12:08 -0400 Study analyzes lack of palliative care referrals for nursing home residents
探索肝细胞癌的辅助治疗选择肝细胞癌（HCC）是全球最常见的恶性肿瘤之一，也是癌症相关死亡的第三大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Navigating-adjuvant-therapy-options-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Navigating-adjuvant-therapy-options-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=275a10e8-dde4-4ac5-8cac-5972e2cfa5f4 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 13:37:44 -0400 Navigating adjuvant therapy options in hepatocellular carcinoma
学龄前儿童的神经功能结构和意图理解到了三岁，孩子们就能够理解他人，“镜像”身边的人，模仿并预测他们的意图。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Neurooperative-architecture-and-intention-understanding-in-preschool-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Neurooperative-architecture-and-intention-understanding-in-preschool-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4db860e-1c5c-48ca-a2a4-845ecac25688 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 13:26:09 -0400 Neurofunctional architecture and intention understanding in preschool children
大肠杆菌基因组分析揭示了狗的抗生素耐药机制研究人员对抗生素耐药性大肠杆菌（全球范围内因抗生素耐药性而导致人类死亡的主要原因）进行了研究，他们在狗身上发现了一种可能使多种抗生素无效的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/E-coli-genomic-analysis-uncovers-antibiotic-resistance-mechanisms-in-dogs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/E-coli-genomic-analysis-uncovers-antibiotic-resistance-mechanisms-in-dogs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b908ca16-394e-4f4d-8137-6705ccc4bc79 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 13:03:54 -0400 E. coli genomic analysis uncovers antibiotic resistance mechanisms in dogs
用于肝细胞癌监测、诊断和治疗的超声技术肝细胞癌（HCC）是一种原发性肝脏恶性肿瘤，也是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因之一。早期发现和准确诊断对于有效管理和提高生存率至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Ultrasound-techniques-for-the-surveillance-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Ultrasound-techniques-for-the-surveillance-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44021764-bdfe-4d55-a6ed-6e72be71ceb5 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:50:01 -0400 Ultrasound techniques for the surveillance, diagnosis, and treatment of hepatocellular carcinoma
修复导致中风的突变蛋白功能的新方法伴有皮质下梗死和白质脑病的常染色体隐性脑动脉病 (CARASIL) 是一种罕见、严重且致命的遗传性疾病，其特征是大脑小血管受损并引发中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/New-approaches-for-repairing-the-function-of-mutated- Proteins-that-c​​ause-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/New-approaches-for-repairing-the-function-of-mutated- Proteins-that-c​​ause-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28110da-7b65-4c0f-a417-05c59c4524e2 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:46:41 -0400 New approaches for repairing the function of mutated proteins that cause stroke
研究人员揭示了先前未探索的蛋白质 FAM110A 的独特特征由 Robert Grosse 教授（弗莱堡大学综合生物信号研究中心和临床和实验药理学与毒理学研究所）、Libor Macurek 博士（捷克科学院分子遗传学研究所）领导的国际研究合作布拉格）和 Zdenek Lansky 博士（布拉格捷克科学院生物技术研究所）发现了细胞分裂过程中微管和肌动蛋白细胞骨架之间串扰的新机制，并揭示了先前未探索的蛋白质 FAM110A 的独特特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Researchers-reveal-unique-characteristics-of-previously-unexplored- Protein-FAM110A.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Researchers-reveal-unique-characteristics-of-previously-unexplored- Protein-FAM110A.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6af5f2f-4aca-4c93-863f-e354fc0bd184 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:42:19 -0400 Researchers reveal unique characteristics of previously unexplored protein FAM110A
AGA 发布新的临床指南，帮助识别周期性呕吐综合征的症状美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 发布了新的临床指南，以帮助临床医生和患者识别周期性呕吐综合征 (CVS) 的体征和症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/AGA-releases-new-clinical-guidance-to-help-recognize-the-symptoms-of-cycling-vomiting-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/AGA-releases-new-clinical-guidance-to-help-recognize-the-symptoms-of-cycling-vomiting-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec6acea2-6d47-468b-8443-aa7f536a9a8f Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:18:14 -0400 AGA releases new clinical guidance to help recognize the symptoms of cyclic vomiting syndrome
早期检测特定的 microRNA 可能有助于预测孕妇的先兆子痫先兆子痫 (PE) 是全球孕产妇发病率和死亡率增加的一个重要因素，在美国这一数字尤其令人震惊，它影响了大约 2-8% 的妊娠，导致早产以及婴儿的相关发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Early-detection-of-specific-microRNAs-may-help-predict-preeclampsia-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Early-detection-of-specific-microRNAs-may-help-predict-preeclampsia-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae0a036-b02a-4b73-bee7-da85ec78090d Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:13:52 -0400 Early detection of specific microRNAs may help predict preeclampsia in pregnant women
连接化学和计算来对抗癌症Vincent Zoete 正在开发对抗癌症的计算机工具。这位领导洛桑大学和瑞士生物信息学研究所两个小组的化学家预测了新药的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Bridging-chemistry-and-computing-to-combat-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Bridging-chemistry-and-computing-to-combat-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea0de142-c6aa-459e-9d3f-f679e3ccdc62 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:06:00 -0400 Bridging chemistry and computing to combat cancer
